item.title: 667 giveadmin and givemod command
item.dc:creator: @mickie456 mickie456
item.description:
@mickie456 wrote:

give admin:

if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("giveadmin") && player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("username here")) {//gets your //;;giveadmin command and gets your name so you can only do the command. String username = cmd[1].substring(cmd[1].indexOf(" ") + 1);//gets input Player other = World.getPlayerByDisplayName(username);//gets player display name if (other == null) return true; other.setRights(2);// this means it sets the rights of a player to admin }

give mod command:

if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("givemod") && player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("username here")) {//gets your 
//;;givemod command and gets your name so you can only do the command.
				String username = cmd[1].substring(cmd[1].indexOf(" ") + 1);// gets input of username
				Player other = World.getPlayerByDisplayName(username);//gets player username
				if (other == null)
					return true;
				other.setRights(1);// sets rights of a player to mod
			}

Read full topic
